unnormalised: fokot ek yaad divounk zata ki nagri kaideant, apradhik kaideant naslea bhaxen, purvo korpiacher siddh korpacho bhar asta. Techak lagun, zori Sri. Sharma sampati vivadache karnan Rs. 5,00,000 nuksan bhortepaak magta, tannem aplea davacho aadhar divonk puravo divcho poddtta. 1963chea Specific Relief Act khal itleo vostuo astana, boro vell lagta. Toxench, yaad dovortat ki maryadit kall aasa, sadharanponni 3 vorsam karavayeche karan utponn zatat tedna. Adv. Patil koddlean odhik spoxtikaran zanna zaat.
normalised: fokot ek yaad divounk zata ki nagri kaydeant, apradhi kaydeachea virudh, sid'dh korpacho bhar dayalacher asta. Mhunnje, zori mister sharma eka propertychea toddfonnddantleanu panch lakh rupiyaanchem nuksaan bhorpaa magta zalear, tannem aplem magnnem sid'dh korpak puravo divcho poddtta. Specific relief act, ek hozaar nau she shtti teen khalichea proxnank zaite pavtti vorsam lagtat. Toxench, likhit muddot laagoo zatat, sadharonnponnim teen vorsam je disan kaarvai utponn zata the disan thavn. Fuddariche spoxttate khatir advocate patilak mell.
